original_title: Time Cop: Justice Has A New Name
overview: Time Cop follows the story of the end of a crumbling partnership between two vigilantes: Time Cop and Time Deputy. They are hot on the trail of drug lord Mr. Klu after following a breadcrumb trail of “yeast”- a new super-drug. Unbeknownst to them, Mr. Klu has hunted down a legendary weapon: “The Bane”.
title: Time Cop: Justice Has A New Name
